metadata.title: Blueshift | Learn Solana Development - Free Courses & Tutorials
metadata.description: Master Solana development with free courses in Anchor, Rust, and TypeScript. Build DeFi protocols, NFTs, and smart contracts with hands-on challenges.
metadata.keywords: Solana, Blueshift, learn, qualification, vault, escrow, AMM, native, pinocchio, quantum, SPL token
metadata.coursesTitle: Solana Development Courses | Anchor, Rust & TypeScript | Blueshift

lessons.title: Solana Courses - Anchor, Rust & TypeScript

paths.title: Solana Development Learning Paths
paths.subtitle: Paths
paths.empty_description: Try changing your filters to see learning paths here.

solana-developer-foundations.title: Solana Developer Foundations
solana-developer-foundations.description: Start your Solana journey with blockchain fundamentals, tokens, and NFTs.

anchor-mastery.title: Anchor Mastery
anchor-mastery.description: Master Anchor framework from basics to advanced program development with hands-on challenges.

native-rust-developer.title: Native Rust Developer
native-rust-developer.description: Build high-performance Solana programs using native Rust and Pinocchio with advanced testing.

typescript-client-developer.title: TypeScript Client Developer
typescript-client-developer.description: Learn to build Solana client applications using TypeScript and web3.js.

security-specialist.title: Security Specialist
security-specialist.description: Deep dive into Solana program security, cryptography, and best practices.

testing-and-tooling.title: Testing & Tooling
testing-and-tooling.description: Master various testing frameworks and developer tools for Solana programs.

advanced-low-level.title: Advanced Low-Level Development
advanced-low-level.description: Explore assembly, instruction introspection, and advanced optimization techniques.

token-developer.title: Token Developer
token-developer.description: Comprehensive guide to SPL tokens and Token-2022 extensions across frameworks.

payments-and-commerce.title: Payments & Commerce
payments-and-commerce.description: Build payment solutions using Solana Pay and token infrastructure.

perks.subtitle: Perks

perks.connect_wallet_description: A Solana wallet is required to unlock and redeem perks.
